richsnippets.label: SEO Markup: Open Graph Protocol & Rich Snippets

website_og_logo.label: Facebook Logo:
website_og_logo.comment: Allowed file types: PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG.

website_tw_logo.label: Twitter Logo:
website_tw_logo.comment: Allowed file types: PNG, GIF, JPG, JPEG.

enable_website.label: Enable In Rich Snippets ▾
enable_website.comment: Website Info will be added by Schema.org: JSON-LD

website_name.label: Website Name
website_name.comment: If empty, the default store name will be used.

enable_seller.label: Enable In Rich Snippets ▾
enable_seller.comment: Seller's Info will be added by Schema.org: JSON-LD

same_as_links.label: Social Links
same_as_links.comment:
The list of social media links
Example:
https://twitter.com/mageworxteam
https://www.facebook.com/mageworx

attribute_code_description.label: Description Attribute Code
attribute_code_description.comment: If empty, use the default short description.

payment_list.label: Payment Methods
payment_list.comment: If empty, the payment method(-s) will be detected automatically.

delivery_list.label: Delivery Methods
delivery_list.comment: If empty, the delivery method(-s) will be detected automatically.

category_deepest.label: Use Deepest Category
category_deepest.comment: Set 'Yes', if products are assifned to multiple categories and sub-categories in the same chain.

enable_dimensions.label: Add Dimensions ▾
enable_dimensions.comment:
The recommended format is
'[Number] {Length unit of measure}'. E.g., '7 ft', '10'.

dimensions_unit.label: Dimensions Unit
dimensions_unit.comment:
If dimensions are digital, enter dimensionality unit
(E.g. mm, inch), in other case leave a field empty.

condition_value_default.label: Default Value For Condition
condition_value_default.comment: Used if the attribute isn't found.

product_custom_properties.label: Custom Properties
product_custom_properties.comment:
A comma-delimited list of schema.org property name and attribute codes.
Example:
mpn,mpn_code
For microdata will be converted to:
<meta itemprop="mpn" content="123456">
For JSON-LD will be converted to:
{ ... "mpn":"12343" ... }

enable_event.label: Enable Event ▾
enable_event.comment: For events like a food fest, music concert, sports contest and others. Implemented with the JSON-LD Markup method.

event_attribute_set.label: Event Attribute Set
event_attribute_set.comment: 'Event' is an entity, set by default.
